page.title: 06YOUTH AND LEISURE ACTIVITIES
page.content: Poulton has a thriving community which has many local societies. These are held in church halls at regular times during the week.There is a Photographic Society,Badminton Club, Rambling Society, and a popular Amateur Dramatics group. The Conservative Club and Poulton Social Club have their own premises. There are many public houses in the area, which are popular with young and old, and there is also one nightclub, catering for the 18-40 age group. There are three Scout packs, and Guide packs being run in the same area. This along with the St. Johns Ambulance Service gives younger children opportunities to take up a worthwhile hobby. Recently a youth club for 14-24 year olds has opened at College House which has proved popular.
